In this release : 0.5
New Wix Deployment Add assemblies to Add Reference Dialog Box : - WFTestDesign - WFTestDesign.Activities - WFTestDesign.Activities.Designer - XmlDiffPatch
Add update Mechanism to stay tuned ;)
Activities Added: - DBQuery activity with UI to create connection string (provider available are : SqlDataSource, Sqlfile, OracleDataSource, AccessDataSource, OdbcDataSource)
Activities updated : - ValidateFile Activity : add a parameter to not throw an exception if one validation is good.
some bugs fixed

This is the first release of WFTestDesign. This release is an alpha release to know the interest of the community for this software.
This release contains : Visual Studio Template and Extensions 10 activities to create Test Case new activities to handle event of the event log according to an ID UI in the visual studio property grid Source code is available.
